Name: Court of Justice's Placid Days
Desc: A lane using the ordinary streets of Fontaine's residential districts as the blueprint. The numerous residences have also reproduced the authentic look of the Court of Fontaine.\nFor many residents of Fontaine, a large part of their lives consists of orderly activity, getting on and off work on time, resting, meeting friends for a meal or shopping, and occasionally heading to the Opera Epiclese for a grand performance. Even some crisis-tested adventurers might sometimes think that such a placid lifestyle might be nice...
